Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: குடிப்பிறந்து தன்கண் பழிநாணு வானைக்கொடுத்தும் கொளல்வேண்டும் நட்பு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The friendship of one who belongs to a (good) family and is afraid of (being charged with) guilt, is worth even purchasing.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person of true nobility is shown. Behind them are the proud, ethereal figures of their good ancestors ('குடிப்பிறந்து'). The person themselves is shown recoiling from a splash of mud, symbolizing their deep, inherent fear of blame or disgrace ('பழிநாணுவானை').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Another person is shown recognizing the immense value of this honorable individual. They are offering a large bag of gold coins, literally trying to buy this person's friendship ('கொடுத்தும் கொளல்வேண்டும்').
Layered_Composition.Background: The friendship, once secured, is shown to be as valuable and reliable as a fortress, a worthy investment.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The friendship of someone from a good family who is inherently afraid of blame is so valuable that it is worth acquiring even at a great cost.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The fear of the mud-splash represents the fear of blame. The act of offering gold to secure the friendship shows its high market value.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A noble, golden light surrounds the honorable person. The scene of offering payment is a straightforward, pragmatic depiction of securing a valuable asset.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A medium shot capturing the interaction, emphasizing the perceived value of the honorable person.

Negative_Prompt: a dishonorable person, text artifacts, cartoonish.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the ancestral figures.
